00023 /* Generic (abstract state machine) state machine : 17.13, 17.14 */
00024  
00025 #ifndef _STP_STATER_H__
00026 #define _STP_STATER_H__
00027 
00028 #define BEGIN  9999 /* distinct from any valid state */
00029 
00030 typedef struct state_mach_t {
00031   struct state_mach_t* next;
00032 
00033   char*         name; /* for debugging */
00034 #ifdef STP_DBG
00035   char          debug; /* 0- no dbg, 1 - port, 2 - stpm */
00036   unsigned int  ignoreHop2State;
00037 #endif
00038 
00039   Bool          changeState;
00040   unsigned int  State;
00041 
00042   void          (* concreteEnterState) (struct state_mach_t * );
00043   Bool          (* concreteCheckCondition) (struct state_mach_t * );
00044   char*         (* concreteGetStatName) (int);
00045   union {
00046     struct stpm_t* stpm;
00047     struct port_t* port;
00048     void         * owner;
00049   } owner;
00050 
00051 } STATE_MACH_T;
00052 
00053 #define STP_STATE_MACH_IN_LIST(WHAT)                              \
00054   {                                                               \
00055     STATE_MACH_T* abstr;                                          \
00056                                                                   \
00057     abstr = STP_state_mach_create (STP_##WHAT##_enter_state,      \
00058                                   STP_##WHAT##_check_conditions,  \
00059                                   STP_##WHAT##_get_state_name,    \
00060                                   self,                           \
00061                                   #WHAT);                         \
00062     abstr->next = self->machines;                                 \
00063     self->machines = abstr;                                       \
00064     self->WHAT = abstr;                       \
00065   }
00066 
00067 
00068 STATE_MACH_T * STP_state_mach_create (void (* concreteEnterState) (STATE_MACH_T*),
00069                                       Bool (* concreteCheckCondition) (STATE_MACH_T*),
00070                                       char * (* concreteGetStatName) (int),
00071                                       void* owner, char* name);
00072 void STP_state_mach_delete (STATE_MACH_T* self);
00073 Bool STP_check_condition (STATE_MACH_T* self);
00074 int STP_enter_state (STATE_MACH_T* self);
00075 Bool STP_change_state (STATE_MACH_T* self);
00076 Bool STP_hop_2_state (STATE_MACH_T* self, unsigned int new_state);
00077 
00078 #endif /* _STP_STATER_H__ */
